cluster_1.sample: it's perfect, fits me just right and was delivered on time.

cluster_2.sample: Great light on the back to let others know that you are biking. Comfortable and well put together

cluster_3.sample: visor was kind of hard to put on.but light works good.fit was kinda hard to do.but i got it.nice helmet

cluster_4.sample:
Bike helmet fits excellent, well  worth the price!
The padding fits great and adjusting to fit is easy.

cluster_5.sample: I already said but the middle piece was VERY hard to snap in, I almost gave up. also, I put in for a return/refund but says I have to take it to a Walmart, I DON'T HAVE A CAR!

cluster_6.sample: Stylish helmet, enjoy the goggles keeps road grime and wind on the eyes. The addition of the rear safety light great idea.

cluster_7.sample: This is a very nice helmet looks good fits good comfortable lite weight, I love it.
